flawed_nl_solution:
Orlan gave Allan 20 x 1/4 = <<20*1/4=80/1>>80/1 meters of rope.
So he had 20 - 80/1 = <<20-80/1=-60>>-60 meters left.
Then he gave -60 x 2/3 = <<-60*2/3=-40>>-40 meters of the rope to Jack.
Therefore, Orlan is left with -60 - -40 = <<-60--40=-20>>-20 meters of rope.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 80/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
